name: Book Delivery $2500 Game Jam Challenge by Backtrace
name_original: Book Delivery $2500 Game Jam Challenge by Backtrace
description:
Book Delivery

Come deliver some books on a game all about going through the quest of sharing books with customers. They want the knowledge and you have it, so go give it to them! With simple gameplay and controls, you can compete with your friends and see who is the best at sharing knowledge with the world!

The controls are as simple as they can be: Move by pressing the "W, A, S, D" keys, use the "Left mouse button" to grab items, use the "Scroll wheel" to push or pull grabbed items and press "Tab" to see your list of books that you need to find.

You have a simple mission of finding all the books from your list and putting them on your box to deliver to customers. For each list you have complete, you will gain Knowledge Points, to trade for buying new books for your shelves.

Don't let your time run out, or you will lose your points. If you get negative points....it's game over!

Backtrace

Backtrace is a debugging platform that improves game quality, reliability, and support by bringing deep introspection and automation throughout the game error lifecycle. Spend less time debugging and reduce your mean time to resolution by using the first and only platform to combine symbolic debugging, error aggregation, and state analysis. https://backtrace.io/ 

A link to your Backtrace project instance

  1. https://altairjr.sp.backtrace.io/p/backtrace/triage?aggregations=((guid%2Cunique)%2C(classifiers%2Chead))
  2. https://submit.backtrace.io/altairjr/49924cda2f13d2e7b3bc5a3fc74d6dd0e368a8b5ea3a116d75cfbc37a174cdcc/json

There must be at least one error report in the provided instance from during the game jam
